setting.msg-restart-required: इस विकल्प को प्रभावी होने के लिए पुनरारंभ की आवश्यकता है।

editor.name: एडिटर
editor.option-spellcheck-description: स्पेल चेक को चालू करता है। अभी के लिए केवल अंग्रेजी (युस) के साथ काम करता है।
editor.spellcheck-languages-description: वर्तनी-जांचकर्ता के उपयोग के लिए भाषाएँ चुनें।
editor.spellcheck-languages-mac-description: मूल वर्तनी जांचकर्ता स्वचालित रूप से macOS पर आपके लिए उपयोग की जा रही भाषा का पता लगाएगा।
editor.option-show-inline-title-description: फ़ाइल नाम को फ़ाइल सामग्री के साथ एक संपादन योग्य शीर्षक के रूप में प्रदर्शित करता है।
editor.option-readable-line-length: पढ़ने के लिए लाइन की लम्बाई
editor.option-readable-line-description: अधिकतम लाइन लंबाई को सीमित करता है। कम सामग्री स्क्रीन पर फिट करता है, लेकिन लंबे पैराग्राफ को अधिक पढ़ने योग्य बनाता है।
editor.option-strict-line-break-description: पूर्वावलोकन मोड में, मार्कडाउन विनिर्देशों के अनुसार सिंगल लाइन ब्रेक को अनदेखा करें। पूर्वावलोकन में दिखाने के लिए सिंगल लाइन ब्रेक के लिए इसे बंद करें।
editor.option-properties-in-document-descriptio: चुनें कि संपादक के भीतर गुण कैसे प्रदर्शित किए जाते हैं। गुणों को YAML के रूप में प्रदर्शित करने के लिए "स्रोत" का चयन करें।
editor.option-show-file-properties-description: फ़ाइल के शीर्ष पर गुण अनुभाग दिखाएँ.
editor.option-auto-pair-brackets-description: कोष्ठक और उद्धरण-चिन्ह स्वतः बंद करें।
editor.option-auto-pair-markdown-description: बोल्ड और इटैलिक के लिए प्रतीकों को स्वचालित रूप से जोड़ें।
editor.option-smart-indent-lists-description: अपने लिए इंडेंटेशन और सूची मार्कर का ध्यान रखें।
editor.option-fold-heading-description: आपको हर चीज़ को एक शीर्षक के अंतर्गत मोड़ने दें।
editor.option-fold-indent-description: आपको समान इंडेंटेशन के एक हिस्से, जैसे सूचियाँ, को मोड़ने दें।
editor.option-default-new-tab-view: नए टैब के लिए डिफ़ॉल्ट रूप
editor.option-default-new-tab-view-description: डिफ़ॉल्ट रूप जिसमें एक नया मार्कडाउन टैब खुलता है।
editor.option-open-tab-in-foreground: हमेशा नए टैब पर फोकस करें
editor.option-open-tab-in-foreground-descriptio: जब आप किसी लिंक को नए टैब में खोलें, तो तुरंत उस पर स्विच करें।
editor.option-default-editing-mode-description: नया फलक डिफ़ॉल्ट संपादन तरीके के साथ प्रारंभ होगा।
editor.option-indentation-guide-description: दृश्य मार्गदर्शन के लिए बुलेट बिंदुओं के बीच लंबवत संबंध रेखाएं दिखाएं।
editor.option-use-tabs-description: "टैब" बटन दबाते समय इंडेंट करने के लिए टैब का उपयोग करें। रिक्त स्थान का उपयोग करने के लिए इसे बंद पर सेट करें।
editor.option-tab-size-description: एक टैब के समतुल्य रिक्त स्थानों की संख्या.
editor.option-rtl-description: नोट्स की टेक्स्ट दिशा को दाएं से बाएं प्रदर्शित करने के लिए सेट करता है।
editor.option-auto-convert-html-description: वेबपेजों से चिपकाने और खींचने और छोड़ने पर HTML को स्वचालित रूप से मार्कडाउन में परिवर्तित करें। बिना रूपांतरण के पेस्ट करने के लिए Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+V का उपयोग करें।
editor.option-vim-key-bindings-description: आपको स्रोत संपादक में Vim बटन बाइंडिंग का उपयोग करने दें।
editor.option-vim-key-bindings-mobile: मोबाइल उपकरणों पर, यह सेटिंग प्रति-डिवाइस है और कॉन्फ़िगरेशन फ़ाइल के माध्यम से सिंक्रनाइज़ नहीं की जाती है।
editor.label-confirm-enable-vim: विम मोड में प्रवेश की पुष्टि करें
editor.label-vim-warning: Vim मोड कुशल टेक्स्ट संपादन के लिए है लेकिन यह काफी प्रतिकूल हो सकता है। यदि आप Vim से परिचित नहीं हैं, तो यह विकल्प ऐसा दिखा सकता है जैसे ओब्सीडियन ने काम करना बंद कर दिया है।
editor.label-vim-test: यह सत्यापित करने के लिए कि आप Vim के चारों ओर अपना रास्ता जानते हैं, कृपया नीचे सहेजे बिना Vim को छोड़ने का आदेश दर्ज करें:
editor.msg-vim-mode-enabled: आदेश सही है. Vim मोड अब सक्षम है।
editor.msg-vim-mode-not-enabled: आदेश ग़लत है. आपकी सुरक्षा के लिए Vim मोड अक्षम रहता है।
editor.msg-vim-mode-please-enter-command: कृपया Vim मोड को सक्षम करने के लिए कमांड दर्ज करें

file.name: सञ्चिकाए‍ँ और परिसन्धियाँ
file.option-confirm-file-deletion: सञ्चिका हटाए जाने की पुष्टि करें
file.option-confirm-file-deletion-description: क्या आप सञ्चिका हटाने की पुष्टि के लिए सञ्केत पाना चाहते हैं।
file.option-delete-destination-description: सञ्चिकाओं को हटाने के बाद उनका क्या करें?
file.option-choice-system-trash: सम्विधा के कचरे में ले जाएँ
file.option-choice-vault-trash: Obsidian के कचरे में ले जाएँ (.trash सञ्चय)
file.option-always-update-links: आंतरिक परिसन्धियाों को हमेशा अद्यतन करें
file.option-always-update-links-description: किसी सञ्चिका का नाम बदलने या संकेत देने के बाद परिसन्धि को स्वचालित रूप से अद्यतन करना है या नहीं
file.option-new-note-location-description: नई बनाई गई टिप्पणियाँ कहां रखें? प्लगइन सेटिंग्स इसे प्रत्यादेश कर देंगी
file.option-new-file-folder-path: नई टिप्पणी बनाने के लिए सञ्चय
file.option-new-file-folder-path-description: नई बनाई गई टिप्पणियाँ इस सञ्चय के अंतर्गत दिखाई देंगे। प्लगइन सेटिंग्स इसे प्रत्यादेश कर देंगी
file.option-use-wiki-links-description: Markdown परिसन्धियाों और चित्रों के बजाय [[links]] और ![[images]] के लिए Wikilink स्वतः उत्पन्न करें। इसके बजाय मार्कडाउन लिंक बनाने के लिए इस विकल्प को अक्षम करें
file.option-show-unsupported-files: सभी सञ्चिका विस्तारों का पता लगाएं
file.option-show-unsupported-files-descriptio: किसी भी विस्तार वाली सञ्चिकाए‍ँ दिखाएं, भले ही Obsidian उन्हें मूल रूप से नहीं खोल सके, ताकि आप उनसे परिसन्धियाँ बना सकें और उन्हें File Explorer और Quick Switcher में देख सकें
file.option-link-autocompleted-format-descrip: स्वचालित रूप से आंतरिक परिसन्धि बनाते समय कौन सी परिसन्धियाँ डालनी चाहिए?
file.option-choice-shortest-linktext: जब संभव हो सबसे छोटा रास्ता
file.option-new-attachment-location: नये अनुबद्धों के लिए पूर्वनिर्धारित स्थान
file.option-new-attachment-location-descripti: जहां नए जोड़े गए अनुबद्ध रखे गए हैं
file.option-choice-subdirectory: वर्तमान सञ्चय के अंतर्गत उपसञ्चय में
file.option-attachment-folder-path-descriptio: नव निर्मित अनुबद्ध सञ्चिकाए‍ँ यहां दिखाई देंगी। इसमें drag and drop या pasting के माध्यम से बनाए गए चित्र और audio recording शामिल हैं
file.option-attachment-subfolder-path-descrip: यदि आपकी सञ्चिका "vault/folder", के अंतर्गत है, और आपने उपसञ्चय का नाम "attachments", किया है, तो अनुबद्ध "vault/folder/attachments" में सहेजे जाएंगे
file.option-excluded-files-desc: बहिष्कृत सञ्चिकाएँ विभिन्न स्थानों, जैसे Quick Switcher, link suggestion और Graph View में या तो छिपी हुई होंगी या कम ध्यान देने योग्य होंगी
file.label-no-excluded-filters-applied: अभी कोई बहिष्कृत शोधक लागू नहीं किया गया है। नीचे एक जोड़ें
file.label-excluded-filters-applied: निम्नलिखित शोधकओं से मेल खाने वाली सञ्चिकाएँ वर्तमान में बाहर रखी गई हैं:

appearance.name: रूप
appearance.option-base-theme-description: ओब्सीडियन की डिफाल्ट रंग प्रणाली चुनें।
appearance.option-accent-color-description: Choose the accent color used throughout the app.
appearance.option-interface-font-description: Set base font for all of Obsidian.
appearance.option-zoom-level-description: Controls the overall zoom level of the app.
appearance.option-text-font-description: Set font for editing and reading views.
appearance.option-monospace-font-description: Set font for places like code blocks and frontmatter.
appearance.label-multiple-fonts-currently-in-effect: The following fonts are currently applied:
appearance.label-no-custom-font-set: No custom font is applied right now. Add one below.
appearance.label-font-applied: The first font from this list that is available on your system will be applied.
appearance.msg-font-not-found: This font is not detected on your system.
appearance.msg-font-found: This font is detected on your system.
appearance.option-community-themes-description: कम्युनिटी के द्वारा बनायी गयी अद्भुत थीम्स की समीक्षा करें और प्रयोग करें ।
appearance.option-font-size-description: Font size in pixels that affects editor and preview.
appearance.option-font-size-action-description: Adjust the font size using Ctrl + Scroll, or using the trackpad pinch-zoom gesture.
appearance.option-manage-themes-description: Manage installed themes and browse community themes.
appearance.option-native-menus-desc: Menus throughout the app will match the operating system. They will not be affected by your theme.
appearance.label-no-css-snippets-found: No CSS snippets found in the snippets folder.
appearance.option-frame-description: Determines the styling of the title bar of Obsidian windows. Requires a full restart to take effect.
appearance.option-custom-icon-desc: Set a custom icon for the app
appearance.option-configure-ribbon-desc: Configure what commands appear in the ribbon menu in the navigation bar.
appearance.option-mobile-quick-ribbon-item-desc: Tapping on the ribbon item in the navigation menu will active this ribbon item. Tap and hold will still show the menu.
appearance.option-show-ribbon-desc: Display vertical toolbar on the side of the window.
appearance.label-modal-configuration-desc: Choose what items you want to be active in the ribbon. Drag and drop to change the order.
appearance.option-show-view-header-desc: Display the header at the top of every tab.

hotkeys.name: हॉटकी
hotkeys.tooltip-hotkey-single-conflict: यह हॉटकी संघर्ष करता है "{{command}}" कमांड के साथो
hotkeys.tooltip-hotkey-multiple-conflicts: यह हॉटकी संघर्ष करता है  {{count}} कमांडो के साथो

about.name: General
about.label-up-to-date: Your app is up to date!
about.label-manual-update-required: To support the latest features and to receive the latest security patches, Obsidian needs a major installer update. You need to manually download and reinstall Obsidian.
about.label-new-version-ready: A new version is ready to be installed.
about.option-auto-update-description: Turn this off to prevent the app from checking for updates.
about.option-insider-build-description: Auto-update to insider builds to try out new features. Note that these builds are bleeding edge and might be less stable.
about.option-hw-acceleration-description: Turns on Hardware Acceleration, which uses your GPU to make Obsidian smoother.
about.option-hw-acceleration-warning: If you turn this off, app performance will be severely degraded.
about.option-config-location-description: Use a different config folder than the default one. Must start with a dot.
about.option-config-location-warning: Config location must be a valid folder name that starts with a dot.
about.label-commercial-license-info: Registered to "{{company}}" for {{seats}} users. Valid until {{expiry}}.
about.option-catalyst-desc: You currently have the {{tier}} Catalyst license. Thanks for your support!
about.option-catalyst-desc-no-license: You don't have a Catalyst license right now. Catalyst license is a one-time donation to support Obsidian development.
about.label-add-own-language: See how to add your language to Obsidian.

account.name: खाता
account.option-your-account-desc-no-login: You're not logged in right now. An account is only needed for Obsidian Sync, Obsidian Publish, and Catalyst insider builds.
account.option-commercial-license-desc: If you use Obsidian for commercial purpose, you may need to get a commercial license.
account.message-login-failed: लॉगिन विफल, कृपया अपना ईमेल और पासवर्ड दोबारा जांचें।
account.mfa-wrong-format: The 2FA authenticator code must be 6 digits.
account.mfa-verification-failed: 2FA code is incorrect, please double check your authenticator app.

core-plugin.option-search-plugin-description: Filter plugins by name or description.

third-party-plugin.name: Third-party plugin
third-party-plugin.option-restricted-mode-description: Restricted Mode is off. Turn on to disable community plugins.
third-party-plugin.option-browse-community-plugins-descript: Browse and install third-party plugins made by our amazing community.
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-description-1: Community plugins, like any other software you install, could potentially cause data integrity and security issues.
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-description-2: Plugin security is important to us. Here's what we do:
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-description-3: Despite our efforts, there is still a small chance that a community plugin might misbehave.
third-party-plugin.label-code-review-desc: Plugins undergo an initial code review by our team before they appear in the store.
third-party-plugin.label-open-source-desc: Most plugins are open source on GitHub, so you can inspect the code yourself.
third-party-plugin.label-peer-audit-desc: We have a large community of developers who watch out for each other.
third-party-plugin.label-report-mechanism-desc: We follow up and remove faulty plugins upon user report.
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-disable-confi: Would you like to exit Restricted Mode to enable community plugins? We strongly recommend making backups of your data before doing so.
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author: Do you trust the author of this vault?
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author-description-1: You're opening this vault for the first time, and it comes with some plugins.
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author-description-2: If you obtained this vault from someone else, please note that plugins of unknown origin might pose security risks.
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author-description-3: If you do not fully trust the author of this vault, we recommend staying in Restricted Mode, so the plugins in this vault do not run.
third-party-plugin.label-no-recent-files-found: No recent files found. Type to search...
third-party-plugin.label-unsupported: This plugin does not support your device.
third-party-plugin.label-no-readme: This plugin did not provide a README file.
third-party-plugin.label-uninstall-plugin-confirmation: Are you sure you want to uninstall this plugin? This will delete the folder of the plugin.
third-party-plugin.label-debug-startup-time-description: Show a message with how long each plugin took to initialize when starting the app.
third-party-plugin.option-search-installed-plugin-descripti: Filter installed plugins by name or description.
third-party-plugin.label-donate-modal-title: {{name}} का समर्थन करने के लिए दान करें
third-party-plugin.label-donate-modal-text1: Plugin developers are community volunteers who make amazing things out of passion. If you find this plugin useful, please consider funding its development.
third-party-plugin.label-donate-modal-text2: 100% of your contribution will go to the plugin developer; Obsidian does not take a cut. The funding platform they choose might charge a fee.
third-party-plugin.label-donate-modal-text3: आपके उदार समर्थन के लिए धन्यवाद!

mobile-toolbar.name: Mobile toolbar
mobile-toolbar.option-configure-quick-action-descriptio: Configure which command to trigger when pull down from the top. The current command is set to "{{command}}".
mobile-toolbar.option-add-command-description: Select any global command to add to the toolbar.

print-modal.title: Export to PDF
print-modal.caption: Export "{{filename}}" to PDF with the setting below.

interface.empty-sidebar: The sidebar is empty, try dragging a pane here.
interface.msg-file-changed: "{{file}}" has been modified externally, merging changes automatically.
interface.msg-switched-to-read: Switched default view mode to reading view.
interface.msg-switched-to-edit: Switched default view mode to editor.
interface.msg-upgrade-installer: To use this feature, please re-install with latest installer available from our website.
interface.msg-indexing:
Obsidian is indexing your vault...
This should only happen once.
Some functionality may not be available until this is complete.
interface.msg-sandbox-vault:
This is a sandbox vault.
Changes you make in this vault will be lost.
interface.msg-tab-busy: This tab is currently busy, please try again later

empty-state.unknown-pane-desc: The plugin that created this pane ({{type}}) has gone away

menu.edit-view: Edit (Ctrl/Cmd+Click to edit in new pane)

tooltip.click-to-expand: बड़ा करने के लिए क्लिक करे
tooltip.click-to-collapse: छोटा करने के लिए क्लिक करे
tooltip.not-created-yet: Not created yet, select to create

start-screen.option-open-folder-as-vault-description: Choose an existing folder of Markdown files.
start-screen.option-create-vault-description: Create a new Obsidian vault under a folder.
start-screen.option-connect-obsidian-sync-description: Set up a synced vault with existing remote vault.
start-screen.option-new-vault-name-description: Pick a name for your awesome vault.
start-screen.option-new-vault-location-description: Pick a place to put your new vault.
start-screen.label-new-vault-location-preview: Your new vault will be placed in:
start-screen.msg-error-rename-exists: There is already a vault with this name.
start-screen.msg-error-nested: Cannot move vault into a subfolder of itself.
start-screen.msg-error-rename-open: Can't rename a currently open vault.
start-screen.msg-error-move-exists: There is already a vault at the destination.
start-screen.msg-error-move-open: Can't move a currently open vault.
start-screen.msg-trailing-dot-vault-name: Vault name cannot end with a dot.
start-screen.msg-failed-to-create-vault-at-location: Could not create vault at the given location. Please double check the location and permission.
start-screen.msg-error-remove-current-open-vault: Can't remove a currently open vault.
start-screen.option-connect-vault-desc: Create a synced vault on this device.
start-screen.tooltip-own-vault: This is a remote vault owned by you.
start-screen.tooltip-shared-vault: This is a remote vault shared with you.

starter-content.welcome-file-content:
This is your new *vault*.

Make a note of something, [[create a link]], or try [the Importer](https://help.obsidian.md/Plugins/Importer)!

When you're ready, delete this note and make the vault your own.

start-up.obsidian-load-error: An error occurred while loading Obsidian.

help-screen.label-official-help-site-desc: Read the official help documentation of Obsidian, available in multiple languages.
help-screen.label-discord-chat-desc: Discord is the best place to chat with other experienced Obsidian users from around the world.
help-screen.label-forum-desc: Help each other, post feature requests, report bugs, and have in-depth discussions about knowledge management.
help-screen.label-sandbox-vault-desc: Play around and experiment with various features. Please note your changes will not be saved.

commands.follow-cursor-link: कर्सर के नीचे लिंक को फॉलो करे
commands.open-cursor-link-in-new-tab: Open link under cursor in new tab
commands.open-cursor-link-to-the-right: Open link under cursor to the right
commands.open-cursor-link-in-new-window: Open link under cursor in new window
commands.navigate-tab-left: Focus on tab group to the left
commands.navigate-tab-right: Focus on tab group to the right
commands.search-replace-current-file: वर्तमान फ़ाइल में खोजें और बदलें
commands.toggle-default-new-tab-mode: Toggle default mode for new tabs
commands.toggle-fold-properties: Toggle fold properties in current file
commands.toggle-fold: करंट लाइन पर फोल्ड टॉगल करे
commands.fold-all: सब हैडिंग और लिस्ट को बंद करे
commands.unfold-all: सब हैडिंग और लिस्ट को खोले
commands.toggle-bold: चयन के लिए बोल्ड टॉगल करें
commands.toggle-italics: चयन के लिए इटैलिक टॉगल करें
commands.toggle-highlight: चयन के लिए हाइलाइट टॉगल करें
commands.toggle-preview: एडिट / प्रीव्यू मोड को टॉगल करे
commands.move-to-new-window: Move current pane to new window
commands.open-in-new-window: Open current pane in new window

dialogue.label-link-affected: यह {{links}} को इन {{files}} मैं प्रभावित करेगा।
dialogue.label-confirm-update-link-to-file: क्या आप इंटरनल लिंक्स को अपडेट करना चाहते हैं जो इस फाइल से जुड़े है?
dialogue.label-confirm-deletion: क्या आप पक्का इसे नष्ट करना चाहते हैं "{{filename}}"?
dialogue.label-move-to-system-trash: इसे आपके सिस्टम ट्रैश में ले जाया जाएगा।
dialogue.label-move-to-vault-trash: इसे आपके ओब्सीडियन ट्रैश में ले जाया जाएगा जो की आपके ".trash" छिपा फ़ोल्डर में स्थित है।
dialogue.label-permanent-delete: ये फाइल हमेशा के लिए नष्ट हो जायेगा।
dialogue.label-delete-folder-warning: अगर आप आगे बढ़ेंगे तोह इस फोल्डर के अंदर सब फाइल्स नष्ट होजाएंग।
dialogue.button-delete-do-not-ask-again: नष्ट करो और वापिस मत पूछो
dialogue.label-existing-backlink: अभी के लिए इस नोट की ओर {{links}} संकेत हैं।
dialogue.label-existing-backlink_plural: There are currently {{links}} pointing to this note.
dialogue.msg-file-or-folder-not-found: The file or folder “{{path}}” does not exist.

file-explorer.name: File explorer
file-explorer.desc: See all the files in your vault.
file-explorer.action-create-note-in-current-tab: Create new note in current tab
file-explorer.action-reveal-active-file: Reveal active file in file explorer
file-explorer.command-make-a-copy: Make a copy of the current file
file-explorer.label-sort-a-to-z: Sort by file name (A to Z)
file-explorer.label-sort-z-to-a: Sort by file name (Z to A)
file-explorer.label-sort-new-to-old: Sort by edit time (new to old)
file-explorer.label-sort-old-to-new: Sort by edit time (old to new)
file-explorer.msg-invalid-characters: File name cannot contain any of the following characters:
file-explorer.msg-unsafe-characters: Links will not work with file names containing any of these characters:
file-explorer.msg-file-already-exists: There's already a file with the same name
file-explorer.msg-bad-dotfile: File name must not start with a dot.
file-explorer.msg-set-attachment-folder: Attachments will be saved to "{{path}}" from now on.

search.name: Search
search.desc: Search for keyword in all the notes.
search.option-show-path-description: Display full path of the file rather than just the file name.
search.option-link-style-description: Optionally turn each file result in to a link.
search.option-list-prefix-description: Optionally add a list item prefix to each file result.

quick-switcher.name: Quick switcher
quick-switcher.desc: Jump to any files without leaving your keyboard. Ctrl/Cmd+O to activate.
quick-switcher.label-no-note-create-new: No notes found. Enter to create a new one.
quick-switcher.prompt-type-file-name: Type file to switch to or create...
quick-switcher.tooltip-not-created-yet: Not created yet, select to create
quick-switcher.option-show-existing-only-description: Whether to show links to files that are not yet created.
quick-switcher.option-show-attachments-desc: Show attachment files like images, videos, and PDFs.
quick-switcher.option-show-all-file-types-desc: Show all files including ones that Obsidian can't open. The file will be opened with the default app for that file type.

graph-view.name: Graph view
graph-view.desc: See a graph overview of which notes link to which.
graph-view.option-depth-description: Show nodes this number of links away
graph-view.option-show-tags-description: Tags are linked to the files that contain them
graph-view.option-show-existing-files-only-descript: When checked, links to nonexistent files are not shown
graph-view.option-show-orphans-description: Show files that are not linked to any other file
graph-view.tooltip-click-to-change-drag-to-reorder:
Click to change color
Drag to reorder groups

backlinks.name: बैकलिंक
backlinks.desc: स्टेटस बार में बैकलिंक्स की संख्या दिखाएं।
backlinks.action-open-for-current: वर्तमान फ़ाइल के लिए बैकलिंक्स खोलें
backlinks.option-backlink-in-document-desc: Show backlinks in document by default when opening new panes.

outgoing-links.name: Outgoing Links
outgoing-links.desc: Show outgoing links and detect unlinked mentions of other notes in the current note.
outgoing-links.action-open-for-current: Open outgoing links for the current file

tag-pane.name: Tag pane
tag-pane.desc: Displays all your tags and along with their number of occurrences.

properties.name: Properties view
properties.desc: Show the metadata for your files.
properties.msg-merge-properties-warning-desc: In case of conflicts, the values will be merged or the value from “{{oldKey}}” will be used.

page-preview.name: Page preview
page-preview.desc: Preview a note when hovering an internal link. Ctrl/Cmd + hover in editor mode.
page-preview.label-empty-note: "{{linktext}}" is not created yet. Click to create.
page-preview.label-require-mod: Require {{key}} to trigger page preview on hover

bookmarks.name: Bookmarks
bookmarks.desc: Bookmark frequently used files and searches.

custom-css.name: Custom CSS
custom-css.desc: Reads "obsidian.css" in the vault and applies it.
custom-css.label-no-readme: This theme did not provide a README file.
custom-css.msg-load-error: Could not load community themes, please check your network.
custom-css.msg-now-using-theme: You're now using {{title}} as your CSS theme.

command-palette.name: Command palette
command-palette.desc: Type a command to invoke it. No need to use the UI or remember the shortcut.
command-palette.option-add-new-pin-description: Pinned commands will appear at the top of all commands when no search query is present.

markdown-format-importer.name: Markdown format importer
markdown-format-importer.desc: Convert Markdown from other apps to Obsidian format.
markdown-format-importer.zettelkasten-link-fixer-description: Fixes "[[UID]]" links to full "[[UID File Name]]".
markdown-format-importer.zettelkasten-link-beautifier-description: Fixes "[[UID]]" links and also beautify them "[[UID File Name|File Name]]".
markdown-format-importer.msg-all-files-warning: Warning: the importer will convert all the files in your vault, not just the current file.
markdown-format-importer.msg-override-files-warning: Your files will be overwritten. Back up all your files before attempting conversion.

daily-notes.name: Daily notes
daily-notes.desc: Open today's daily note, or create one if not present.
daily-notes.msg-fail-format: Failed to create daily note. "{{format}}" is not a valid format.
daily-notes.msg-fail-folder: Failed to create daily note. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
daily-notes.msg-fail-template-file: Failed to create daily note. Template file "{{template}}" not found.
daily-notes.msg-no-previous: There's no daily note before this one.
daily-notes.msg-no-next: There's no daily note after this one.
daily-notes.label-syntax-live-preview: Here is what it will look like:
daily-notes.option-new-file-location-description: The folder path to create the new daily note.
daily-notes.option-template-description: The file path to use as template.
daily-notes.option-open-on-start-description: Open your daily note automatically whenever you open this vault.

unique-note-creator.name: Unique note creator
unique-note-creator.desc: Create notes with unique timestamp prefixes, for workflows like zettelkasten or slip box.
unique-note-creator.option-new-file-location-description: The folder path to create the new unique note.
unique-note-creator.msg-folder-not-found: Failed to create unique note. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
unique-note-creator.option-template-file-description: The file path to use as template.
unique-note-creator.msg-template-file-not-found: Failed to create unique note. Template file "{{template}}" not found.
unique-note-creator.msg-failed-to-generate: Failed to generate a unique note with the format "{{format}}

random-note.name: Random note
random-note.desc: Opens a random note. Useful for reviewing and discovering.

outline.name: Outline
outline.desc: Displays the outline of the current file or linked pane.
outline.action-open-for-current: Open outline of the current file

word-count.name: Word count
word-count.desc: Show word count in the status bar.

slides.name: Slides
slides.desc: Present from Markdown. Use "---" to separate slides.

audio-recorder.name: Audio recorder
audio-recorder.desc: Record audio and save as attachment.
audio-recorder.msg-access-denied: Microphone access was denied, please enable it from the preference pane.
audio-recorder.msg-pending-grant: Please grant microphone permission to start recording.

open-with-default-app.name: डिफ़ॉल्ट ऐप में खोलें
open-with-default-app.desc: डिफ़ॉल्ट ऐप में यह फ़ाइल खोलने के लिए बटन लगायें।

templates.name: Templates
templates.desc: Insert template content from a folder of template files.
templates.option-template-folder-location-descript: Files in this folder will be available as templates.
templates.option-template-date-format-description: {{date}} in the template file will be replaced with this value.
templates.option-template-date-format-description2: You can also use {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}} to override the format once.
templates.option-template-time-format-description: {{time}} in the template file will be replaced with this value.
templates.option-template-time-format-description2: You can also use {{time:HH:mm}} to override the format once.
templates.msg-fail-invalid-folder: Failed to list templates. Template folder is invalid.
templates.msg-fail-folder-not-found: Failed to list templates. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
templates.msg-fail-invalid-template-properties: Unable to insert template, the properties in the template file could not be read.
templates.msg-no-folder-set: Failed to list templates. No template folder configured.

translucency.name: Translucent window
translucency.desc: Turn on translucency effect to enhance a sense of depth. Best used with dark mode. Not supported on Linux.

slash-command.name: Slash commands
slash-command.desc: Enable the ability to trigger slash commands in the editor by typing the forward slash.

editor-status.name: Editor status
editor-status.desc: Adds a status bar item to show and change the current editor mode.

publish.name: Publish
publish.desc: Publish your notes through Obsidian Publish.
publish.label-no-internet-access: You need access to the internet to publish changes.
publish.label-publish-service-description: Obsidian Publish is an add-on paid service that lets you publish your notes online directly from Obsidian.
publish.label-please-login: To start publishing, please log in or create a new Obsidian account.
publish.label-no-publish-subscription: You do not have an Obsidian Publish subscription yet.
publish.label-delete-site-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this site?
publish.label-delete-site-details: This will immediately and permanently delete your site.
publish.option-site-id-description: Your site will be at https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id}. You can change this later. Only lower case letters, numbers, and dashes are allowed.
publish.msg-invalid-site-id: Site ID can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes.
publish.msg-site-id-in-use: This site ID is in use, please try another one.
publish.msg-create-site-issue: That was an issue when creating your site.
publish.option-site-name-description: Name of your published site. It will show up in the page title of your site.
publish.option-home-page-file-description: The first page the user sees when landing on your published site
publish.option-logo-description: Pick an image file as your site logo.
publish.option-logo-placeholder: Any any uploaded image in your vault...
publish.option-customize-navigation-desc: Override the order of navigation items and hide pages or folders from showing.
publish.option-hide-items-in-navigation: Hide pages or folders from navigation
publish.option-hide-items-in-navigation-desc: Right click and select "Hide" to prevent specific pages from appearing in the site navigation. The pages will still be accessible via links or accessing the URL directly.
publish.label-navigation-modal-desc: Drag and drop to customize the order in which navigation items appear on your Publish site.
publish.option-theme-description: Choose default color scheme for your site.
publish.option-show-theme-toggle-description: Let the visitor toggle between light and dark theme on their own.
publish.option-show-navigation-description: Display a list of all published pages on the left side of your published site.
publish.option-show-search-description: Display a search bar at top of the navigation that lets the visitors search pages and headings on your site.
publish.option-show-graph-description: Display a small local graph on each page.
publish.option-show-outline-description: Display the outline of headings on each page.
publish.option-show-backlinks-description: Show backlink section at the end of each page.
publish.option-sliding-window-mode-description: Open pages in new panes to the right. Allows scrolling through panes horizontally.
publish.option-hover-preview-file-description: Display page preview when hovering links.
publish.option-hide-title-description: Hide the page title heading. Useful when you have your own headings at the beginning of each page.
publish.option-readable-line-length-description: Limit maximum line length. Fits less content on the screen, but makes long paragraphs more readable.
publish.option-site-password-description: Restrict access to your site with passwords.
publish.option-google-analytics-description: Configure Google Analytics for your site. Only available for visitors from your custom domain URL. Please check with your local laws and regulations first.
publish.tooltip-add-linked: Add all files that are linked by currently selected items
publish.msg-no-permission-to-publish-to-site: You do not have permissions to publish to the current site.
publish.msg-select-at-least-one-file: Please select at least one file.
publish.label-clear-cache: It takes up to a few minutes for the changes to show up on your site. If you do not see your latest changes, try clearing the cache in your browser.
publish.label-visit-site: You can visit your site here:
publish.msg-something-went-wrong: Something went wrong. Please check the developer console for details.
publish.label-no-password: Your site currently does not have any passwords. Anyone can visit it.
publish.label-have-password: Your site is password protected. If you have multiple passwords, visitors can access your site by entering any of them.
publish.option-password-desc: A hash of your password will be stored securely. Once the password is set, it cannot be revealed in plaintext.
publish.option-nickname-desc: Set a nickname to remind yourself what or who the password is for.
publish.option-custom-domain-desc: Use your own domain rather than the https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id} URL.
publish.option-noindex-desc: Prevent search engines from indexing your site.
publish.option-custom-url-desc: The URL that your site will be located at.
publish.option-custom-url-redirect-desc: Redirect visitors on publish.obsidian.md/id to your custom domain.
publish.label-custom-domain-instructions: Please refer to our {{link}} on our help site for more information.
publish.label-sharing-with-users: This site is currently shared with the following people.
publish.label-not-sharing: This site is not currently shared with anyone.
publish.error-email-must-be-valid: Please enter a valid email to invite someone.
publish.msg-enable-publish-plugin: Please enable the Publish core plugin in Settings -> Core plugins to view sites.
publish.label-leave-site-confirmation-details: This will remove this site from the list of sites shared with you. This action cannot be reverted.
publish.label-leave-site-confirmation-details-2: Please contact the owner of the site if you wish to collaborate on this site again.
publish.label-confirm-override-1: Are you sure you want to override the local version?
publish.label-confirm-override-2: The live version will be used and your local version will be discarded. Please make backups if necessary.
publish.message-successfully-used-live-version: Successfully used live version to override your local version.
publish.option-included-folders-desc: Files under these folders will automatically be selected when you review changes to publish.
publish.option-excluded-folders-desc: Files under these folders won't show up when you review changes to publish. This setting takes priority over included folders above.
publish.label-add-included-folder-desc: You can include both existing folders and folders that have not been created yet.

workspaces.name: Workspaces
workspaces.msg-enter-name: Please enter a name for the new layout.

sync.name: Sync
sync.desc: Synchronize your files through Obsidian Sync.
sync.msg-already-latest-version: This version is already the latest version.
sync.label-no-history: No sync history for this file.
sync.label-click-to-see-history: Click on a deleted file to see its history.
sync.label-remote-vault-explanation: Remote vaults securely synchronize your vault between devices.
sync.option-vault-name-desc: Helps you remember what this vault is for.
sync.option-vault-region-desc: Select the server region closest to you to store the remote vault. This cannot be changed in the future.
sync.option-use-custom-encryption-password-de: If you turn this off, we will securely manage an encryption key for you.
This option cannot be changed later.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc: This password cannot be changed later.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc-warning: If you forget this password, any remote data will remain unusable forever.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc-2: This does not affect your local data.
sync.label-encryption-password-explanation: The remote vault “{{name}}” is currently encrypted. Enter your password to unlock.
sync.label-rename-remote-vault-desc: Enter a new name for this remote vault.
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-questi: Are you sure you want to delete this remote vault?
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-result: All data on our server, including version history, will be deleted. Your local files will stay intact.
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-warnin: This action is permanent and irreversible.
sync.msg-disconnect-from-deleted-vault: Obsidian Sync: The connected remote vault no longer exists.
sync.label-not-remote-vaults: You don't have any remote vaults.
sync.label-no-subscription: You don't have an active Obsidian Sync subscription.
sync.option-event-type-desc: Only show log items of the selected type.
sync.label-third-party-sync-warning-desc: Warning: Your vault seems to be using {{service}} as a third party sync service. If you use Obsidian Sync with this vault, you may run into conflicts, file corruption, or data loss.
sync.label-icloud-drive-warning: If you are using iCloud Drive, your Documents and Desktop folders might be synced by iCloud. This could cause conflicts with Obsidian Sync.
sync.option-remote-vault-desc-connected: Currently connected to the "{{name}}" remote vault.
sync.option-remote-vault-desc-not-connected: Currently not connected to any remote vault.
sync.option-device-name-desc: This name will be displayed in the sync log. Leave empty to use the default name.
sync.option-sync-log-desc: View recent sync activities for debugging.
sync.option-vault-size-unknown: Unable to retrieve your vault size.
sync.msg-largest-files-desc: These are the remote files that are taking the most space. After deleting attachments, use the purge button to free up remote vault space.
sync.tooltip-purge-remote: Permanently purge deleted attachments from remote vault to save space.
sync.option-prevent-sleep-desc: Prevents the device from going to sleep when there are still files to be synced.
sync.option-excluded-folder-desc: Prevent certain folders from being synced.
sync.option-sync-image-desc: Sync image files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-sync-audio-desc: Sync audio files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-sync-video-desc: Sync video files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-view-config-files-desc: View and restore version history of setting files.
sync.option-sync-app-desc: Enable to sync editor settings, files & links settings, custom hotkeys, etc.
sync.option-sync-appearance-desc: Sync appearance settings like dark mode, active theme, and enabled snippets.
sync.option-sync-appearance-data-desc: Sync downloaded themes and snippets. Whether they are enabled depends on the previous setting.
sync.option-sync-core-plugin-desc: Sync which core plugins are enabled.
sync.option-sync-community-plugin-desc: Sync which community plugins are enabled.
sync.option-sync-community-plugin-data-desc: Sync installed community plugins (.js, .css, and manifest.json files) and their settings.
sync.label-sync-introduction: Obsidian Sync is Obsidian's add-on sync service with end-to-end encryption and version history.
sync.label-account-required: To start syncing, please log in or create a new Obsidian account.
sync.label-number-of-folders-excluded: {{folders}} are currently excluded from being synced.
sync.label-add-excluded-folder-desc: You can exclude both existing folders and folders that have not been created yet.
sync.msg-vault-has-notes: Your local vault already contains some notes.
sync.msg-vault-merge-warning: If you connect to the remote vault "{{name}}", notes in your local vault will be merged with notes from your remote vault. In case of conflicts, the most recent version of the note will be preserved.
sync.tooltip-update-setting-on-all-devices: Please update this option and restart app on all the devices where you want it to take effect.
sync.label-sharing-with-users: This remote vault is currently shared with the following people.
sync.label-not-sharing: This remote vault is not currently shared with anyone.
sync.label-leave-vault-confirmation-details: This will remove this vault from the list of vaults shared with you. This action cannot be reverted.
sync.label-leave-vault-confirmation-details-2: Please contact the owner of the vault if you wish to collaborate on this vault again.
sync.label-require-subscription-to-connect: You need an Obsidian Sync subscription to connect to this vault.
sync.option-contact-support-desc: If you run into any issues with Obsidian Sync, please contact us so we can help you out! You can reach us at support@obsidian.md.
sync.label-sync-disconnected: Sync is not connected to a remote vault.
sync.msg-remote-vault-limit-hit: Obsidian Sync lets you create up to 5 remote vaults. In order to create a new remote vault, please remove an existing one.

file-recovery.name: File recovery
file-recovery.desc: Let you restore recent snapshots to recover from accidental data loss. Snapshots are only saved for Markdown files.
file-recovery.option-interval-description: Minimal interval in minutes between two snapshots.
file-recovery.option-keep-description: Length in days snapshots is kept for.
file-recovery.label-clear-warning: Are you sure you want to delete all snapshots? Note that only snapshots will be removed. All files inside your vault will not be affected.
file-recovery.label-select-file: Please select a file on the left to view snapshots.

note-composer.name: Note composer
note-composer.option-split-replacement-text-descriptio: What to show in place of the selected text after extracting it.
note-composer.option-template-file-description: Template file to use when merging or extracting. Available variables: {{content}}, {{fromTitle}}, {{newTitle}}, {{date:FORMAT}}, e.g. {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}}.
note-composer.command-merge-file: Merge current file with another file...
note-composer.label-confirm-file-merge: Are you sure you want to merge "{{file}}" into "{{destination}}"? "{{file}}" will be deleted.
note-composer.msg-fail-to-fetch-template: Failed to fetch template file: "{{template}}" not found.

canvas.name: Canvas
canvas.desc: Arrange and connect notes on an infinite canvas.
canvas.action-create-with-size: Create a card with specific size
canvas.action-drag-to-add-note: Drag to add note from vault
canvas.action-drag-to-add-media: Drag to add media from vault
canvas.label-export-png-desc: Export "{{title}}" with a PNG file with the settings below.
canvas.option-new-canvas-location: Default location for new canvas files
canvas.option-new-canvas-location-description: Where newly created canvas files are placed.
canvas.option-new-canvas-folder-path: Folder to create new canvas files in
canvas.option-new-canvas-folder-path-descriptio: Newly created canvas files will appear under this folder.
canvas.option-snap-to-grid-desc: Snap cards to the background grid when moving and resizing.
canvas.option-snap-to-objects-desc: Snap cards to nearby objects when moving and resizing.
canvas.option-zoom-breakpoint: Zoom threshold for hiding card content
canvas.option-zoom-breakpoint-desc: Lower values will increase performance but hide card content sooner when zooming out.
canvas.option-export-png-show-logo-desc: This will add an Obsidian logo to the bottom left.
canvas.option-export-png-privacy-mode-desc: This will obscure any text on your canvas.
canvas.option-export-png-zoom-desc: A higher zoom will generate a higher resolution image.
canvas.option-export-png-frame-desc: Choose to render the entire canvas or just the current visible viewport.
canvas.label-drag-from-below: Drag from below or double click
canvas.label-longpress: Touch and hold to add / move / select

pdf.action-reveal-in-outline: Reveal page in table of contents

properties.label-invalid-yaml-marker: Syntax error. Your frontmatter is invalid.
properties.label-migration-warning-desc: Are you sure you want to change the type? Some of the data associated with this property key is incompatible.
